channel.title: How to make yourself into NPC?
channel.description:
Hello, i was wondering if there is any way to make yourself look into a npc i saw a client that had it if you can help plzpost
i am using frigment source!!!! :confused:

item.title: How to make yourself into NPC?
item.dc:creator: @hgfdg hgfdg
item.source: How to make yourself into NPC?

item.title: How to make yourself into NPC?
item.dc:creator: @Argentina Argentina
item.description:
@Argentina wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

	if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
		npcId = newNPC;
		isNpc = true;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	} else {
		sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
	}
} catch (Exception e) {
	sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
}

}[/code]
That command will turn you into one.

How to use?:
::pnpc NPCIDHERE

-Argentina

Read full topic
item.source: How to make yourself into NPC?
